programme.desc: Reba tries to reconcile with Van and his parents, but her plan backfires when his mother walks out on her husband and stays with Reba.

programme.desc: When Frankie and Nate agree to host an annual celebration, they must make a big splash to ensure the viability of their winery going forward. The paramours will find out if business can be mixed with pleasure.

programme.desc: Ilana travels to the island of Santorini with her Greek boyfriend, Mike, for a family wedding. When he surprises her by proposing, she gets caught up in the whirlwind of his overzealous mom.

programme.title: The Perfect Setting
programme.desc: An aspiring jewelry designer returns to Belgium to visit her grandfather and hopefully win the Valentine's Day Diamond Contest.

programme.title: Savoring Paris
programme.desc: Disillusioned with her life, Ella embarks on a soul-searching journey to Paris, navigating love, self-discovery and cheese amid the city's enchanting backdrop.

programme.title: The Sweetest Heart
programme.desc: With help from a handsome investment banker, Maddie does everything she can to save her cupcake business. When her first love unexpectedly returns home, she must choose between a new romance and the man she never stopped loving.

programme.desc: Taking a break from her wellness empire, an entrepreneur develops a budding romance with a handsome man at a relaxing retreat.

programme.desc: When two weddings are ruined by both the bride and groom getting left at the altar, they still decide to take their honeymoons, not knowing they are heading to the same resort in Hawaii.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy wants her ex-husband back when he becomes engaged to another woman.

programme.title: Branching Out
programme.desc: To help build a family tree, single mom Amelia tracks down her daughter's biological father. It soon becomes a journey of trust, love and discovering the real meaning of family.

programme.title: Snowcoming
programme.desc: A famous NFL quarterback returns to his hometown to celebrate his high school football coach's retirement. While in town, he rekindles a romance with his former sweetheart.

programme.title: Head Over Heels
programme.desc: Addison lands a life-changing internship at a studio leading up to the New York Fashion Week. Addison is determined to hold onto her integrity and her family values while struggling to balance it all and forge a path to success and romance.

programme.title: Love on the Right Course
programme.desc: A professional golfer suffers a series of setbacks and returns home to Budapest to reevaluate her future. While there, a golf pro helps her rediscover herself and find love.

programme.title: Love on the Air
programme.desc: Sonia moves to Chicago to be with her boyfriend and starts a new radio gig. When her relationship ends, she confides in a competing shock jock and the two become rivals. When they are forced to work together, they find they have a lot in common.

programme.title: Love & Jane
programme.desc: Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, gets the surprise of a lifetime when her favorite author, Jane Austen, comes into her life.
